text: "It's a Long Way There" is a 1976 song by Australian band Little River Band and is the third single from their debut studio album Little River Band. It went to number 14 in the Netherlands, number 28 in the United States, number 32 in New Zealand and number 35 in Australia. ==Track listings== ;Australian 7" (EMI 11292) :Side A. "It's a Long Way There" - 8:39 :Side B. "Time to Fly" - 3:00 ; US 7" (Harvest 4318) :Side A. "It's a Long Way There" - 4:16 :Side B. "Meanwhile" - 3:53 Category:1976 songs Category:Little River Band songs
title: It's a Long Way There
